issue.title: [C++] Bump vendored zlib
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18083](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18083). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ZLib recently released version 1.2.13, which includes a security fix.
We should bump the vendored version before 10.0.0.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18083?focusedCommentId=17619898) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14446
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14446>
